com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.preference

Class DynamicPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.preference.DynamicPreferences

  • public class DynamicPreferences
extends Object
    Helper class to handle shared preferences operations like saving or retrieving the values from default shared preferences. It must be initialized once before accessing its methods.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Context mContext
      Context to retrieve the resources.

      • initializeInstance

        public static void initializeInstance(Context context)
        Initialize preferences when application starts.

        Must be initialized once.

        Parameters:
        context - The context to retrieve resources.

      • getInstance

        public static DynamicPreferences getInstance()
        Get instance to access public methods. Must be called before accessing the methods.
        Returns:
        The singleton instance of this class.

      • getContext

        public Context getContext()
        Returns the context used by this instance.
        Returns:
        The context to retrieve the resources.

      • savePrefs

        public void savePrefs(String preferences,
                      String key,
                      boolean value)
        Set a boolean value in the supplied preferences editor and call SharedPreferences.Editor#apply() to apply changes back from this editor.
        Parameters:
        preferences - The preferences name to store the key.
        key - The preference key to modify.
        value - The value for the preference.
        See Also:
        Context.getSharedPreferences(String, int)

      • savePrefs

        public void savePrefs(String key,
                      boolean value)
        Set a boolean value in the default preferences editor and call SharedPreferences.Editor#apply() to apply changes back from this editor.
        Parameters:
        key - The preference key to modify.
        value - The value for the preference.
        See Also:
        PreferenceManager.getDefaultSharedPreferences(Context)

      • loadPrefs

        public boolean loadPrefs(String preferences,
                         String key,
                         boolean value)
        Retrieve a boolean value from the supplied preferences.
        Parameters:
        preferences - The preferences name to find the key.
        key - The preference key to modify.
        value - The value for the preference.
        Returns:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or the default value.

        Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not a boolean.

        See Also:
        Context.getSharedPreferences(String, int)

      • loadPrefs

        public boolean loadPrefs(String key,
                         boolean value)
        Retrieve a boolean value from the default preferences.
        Parameters:
        key - The preference key to modify.
        value - The value for the preference.
        Returns:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or the default value.

        Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not a boolean.

        See Also:
        PreferenceManager.getDefaultSharedPreferences(Context)

      • loadPrefs

        public int loadPrefs(String preferences,
                     String key,
                     int value)
        Retrieve an integer value from the supplied preferences.
        Parameters:
        preferences - The preferences name to find the key.
        key - The preference key to modify.
        value - The value for the preference.
        Returns:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or the default value.

        Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not an integer.

        See Also:
        Context.getSharedPreferences(String, int)

      • loadPrefs

        public int loadPrefs(String key,
                     int value)
        Retrieve an integer value from the default preferences.
        Parameters:
        key - The preference key to retrieve.
        value - Value to return if this preference does not exist.
        Returns:
        Returns the preference value if it exists, or the default value.

        Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not an integer.

        See Also:
        PreferenceManager.getDefaultSharedPreferences(Context)
